directions: Stir vegetable broth, water, salt, pepper, sugar, garlic powder, thyme, and rosemary together in a saucepan over medium heat; bring to a boil. Cook, stirring regularly, until the salt and sugar are dissolved, about 5 minutes. Cool completely.
Mix brine and ice together in a large container.
ingredients: 10 pounds ice cubes, or as needed
title: Jeff's Turkey Brine
